Command Line Basics for R Users Preface Structure of the book Software information

Command Line Basics for R Users Aravind Hebbali 2019-10-18 Preface This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License. Structure of the book Chapter 1 introduces the concept of version control and its benefits. Chapter ?? introduces basic command line skills. Chapter ?? deals with setting up git. Chapter ?? shows how to set up GitHub projects using RStudio. Chapter ?? gives a tour of GitHub features. Chapter ?? explores git commands in some detail.
